text: 21 5,8 HRrly 7qly TTATf wifetaru T4R Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (4av& 44rt 3< {orf 4At4) 47477 Fex : 91-11-25093507 25093514 Hi National Highways Authority of India (Mlnlstry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 Q 6, 84rr-10, ERI, T farll-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 No. 11041/116/2010-Coord Dated: 25.10.2013 CIRCULAR Sub: Orlginating correspondence on flles Reference is made to earlier Circulars of even number dated 08.08.201.3 and 21.8.2013 (copies enclosed) vide which instructions were issued that all correspondence must be placed in the file duly numbered. 2 It has been observed thaf in some cases the numbering of the correspondence pages has been done in pencil which unnecessarily leaves scope for tampering later on. It shall be ensured that this numbering must be done properly with ink pen only. 3_ These . instructions must be followed scrupulously. Henceforth, jf violation is observed, the originator of the note would be held responsible and suitable action for deliberate disobedience and dereliction of duty shall be initiated: 4 This issues with the approval of Member (Admin): 2 Iv (V.K: Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord ) To All officers and employees of HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices to: AHl Members/CVO.
